sc.server.gaming
Class GameRoomManager

java.lang.Object
  sc.server.gaming.GameRoomManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class GameRoomManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

The GameManager is responsible to keep all games alive and kill them once they are done. Additionally the GameManger has to detect and kill games, which seem to be dead-locked or have caused a timeout.

Author:
mja, rra
